overview: Fun-loving director Proxy Paige features extreme anal sex and more raunchy shenanigans in the crude chronicles of "I Fucking Love Berlin." Raw, documentary-style footage captures Proxy and friends on a wild, hellacious, three-day road trip, engaging in risky public nudity, debauched orgies and crazy double penetration. The party climaxes with an outrageous sex show at decadent Club Insomnia!
title: I Fucking Love Berlin
